sentences.sContent: The court bailiff said jurors did not wish to speak to news media until the sentencing.
sentences.sCn: 法院法警说，陪审员不想在宣判之前接受新闻媒体采访。

synos.tran: [法]法警；执行官；区镇的地方长官

remMethod.val: 法警 (bailiff) 前往悬崖 (cliff) 执行公务

trans.tranOther: an official of the legal system who watches prisoners and keeps order in a court of law
